---

## ğŸ¨ Design Theme

**Color Palette:**
- **Black** (#000000) - Premium, luxury, sophisticated
- **Emerald Green** (#10b981) - Brand color, trust, energy
- **White** (#ffffff) - Clean, professional text

**Design Philosophy:**
- Minimalist, professional aesthetic
- High contrast for visibility
- Premium feel (Uber Black inspired)
- Fast loading (optimized file sizes)
- Consistent brand identity

---

## ğŸ”„ Regenerate Assets

If you edit any SVG source files:

```bash
npm run generate:assets
```

This will regenerate all PNG files from SVG sources.

---

## ğŸ“± Configuration

**app.json settings:**
- Splash background: `#000000` (black)
- Android adaptive icon background: `#000000` (black)
- All assets optimized for production
